name: UofInfo.com
overview:
UofInfo.com is a new and exciting way to find local businesses in your college area. It is a great resource for the latest news, connecting with classmates, reviewing local businesses, and finding out what is happening around your college campus.

Everyone is able to use limited features on UofInfo.com and it is 100% FREE! College students can gain access to all available features just by signing up.

I am a college student, so what do I get by signing up?

  • Write reviews about local businesses that only your college peers can read.
  • Earn points for writing reviews, posting events and more. You can win airline vouchers, gift cards, and other great prizes!
  • See your friends’ and classmates’ favorite local businesses, and what their recommendations are.
  • Find out what your college town is up to; local events, concerts, movies, and view recent photos and items for sale.
  • Looking to save money? Check out our printable coupons and daily specials.
  • We also give you a profile where you can upload a picture, give some fun facts, and be part of your college social network.
